channel.title: green ripe on funPlantGenes
channel.description: Recent content in green ripe on funPlantGenes

item.title: FaPE1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: FaPE1 Gene Name: pectinesterase1 Genome: Species: Fragaria ananassa Functional Descriptions: Concerning hormone regulation, auxin treatment increased FaPE1 mRNA levels in green fruit, whereas exogenous ethylene decreased FaPE1 mRNA levels in ripe and senescing fruits.

item.title: SlAREB1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: SlAREB1 Gene Name: ABA-response element binding factor 1 Genome: Species: Solanum lycopersicum Functional Descriptions: The transcription factor AREB1 regulates primary metabolic pathways in tomato fruits.

item.title: SlGLK2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Solyc10g008160 Gene Symbol: SlGLK2 Gene Name: GOLDEN2-LIKE 2 Genome: Species: Solanum lycopersicum Functional Descriptions: Tomato GOLDEN2-LIKE Transcription Factors Reveal Molecular Gradients That Function during Fruit Development and Ripening.

item.title: SlPSY1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Solyc03g031860 Gene Symbol: SlPSY1 Gene Name: Genome: Tomato Genome version SL4.

item.title: SlSGR1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Solyc08g080090 Gene Symbol: SlSGR1 Gene Name: Stay-Green 1 Genome: Tomato Genome version SL4.
